title: All the It Girls Have This Affordable Shoe Brand in Their Closets
description: This celeb-approved label is designed for the spotlight.
excerpt: This celeb-approved label is designed for the spotlight.
text: I’m constantly on the lookout for a statement heel that I can wear both at the office and on weekends. My criteria are quite particular—I prefer unique designs and interesting, luxe materials like ruched leather or suede, and comfort is essential. Being able to walk pain-free for hours is a non-negotiable requirement.While browsing the heel selection at one of my favorite retailers, Revolve, I came across a brand that has captured my attention for some time: Tony Bianco. I’ve seen this brand on numerous celebrities, including Bella and Gigi Hadid, Hailey Bieber, and Sophie Richie Grainge, and I’ve been eagerly keeping an eye on its new styles for 2025. If you’re like me, you may have a small collection of daring platforms gathering dust in your closet due to their impracticality. While I appreciate a stylish heel, I also need to be able to run errands and traverse city streets without feeling like I’m walking on fire. For someone with sensitive feet, discovering a brand that offers standout styles with ample arch support can be a challenge. Fortunately, Tony Bianco’s shoes are not only comfortable but also ultra-chic. I purchased the trending Shae mule in butterscotch suede, and I’m not exaggerating when I say I can comfortably wear them daily. The material is buttery soft, and the spacious toe box means I don’t have to fret about pinching or rubbing.If you’re in search of an elegant kitten heel or a sophisticated slingback that will turn heads, Tony Bianco boasts a wide array of unique options that perfectly balance comfort and style. Explore your new favorite footwear, whether you prefer a low heel, a flat, or something with more height; this trendsetting brand has something to suit everyone’s taste.The Polished Low HeelFor an everyday option, consider a low- to mid-height heel for all-day comfort. Best paired with an ankle-grazing palazzo pant or flouncy midi skirt, these styles are bound to invite envious glances. Tony Bianco Shae MuleTony Bianco Quill SlingbackTony Bianco Daisy SandalTony Bianco Tuscany MuleTony Bianco Koko SlingbackTony Bianco Caprice HeelThe Sleek High HeelWhether you’re after a mesh heel for a date night in the city, or an elegant raffia sandal to complement vacation dresses, our top picks below have you covered.Tony Bianco Corso HeelTony Bianco Miley SandalTony Bianco Georgie PumpTony Bianco Ace HeelTony Bianco Maxi SandalTony Bianco Lamar HeelThe Glamorous FlatThese options prove that a flat can be just as sophisticated as a heel. Opt for a suede loafer to work, a chunky flip-flop for a trip to the beach, or a versatile ballet flat for any casual outing.Tony Bianco Javier FlatTony Bianco Hawaii FlatTony Bianco Axell LoaferTony Bianco Ives SandalTony Bianco Martinez FlatTony Bianco Zoe LoaferWhy Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
I’m constantly on the lookout for a statement heel that I can wear both at the office and on weekends. My criteria are quite particular—I prefer unique designs and interesting, luxe materials like ruched leather or suede, and comfort is essential. Being able to walk pain-free for hours is a non-negotiable requirement.

While browsing the heel selection at one of my favorite retailers, Revolve, I came across a brand that has captured my attention for some time: Tony Bianco. I’ve seen this brand on numerous celebrities, including Bella and Gigi Hadid, Hailey Bieber, and Sophie Richie Grainge, and I’ve been eagerly keeping an eye on its new styles for 2025.

If you’re like me, you may have a small collection of daring platforms gathering dust in your closet due to their impracticality. While I appreciate a stylish heel, I also need to be able to run errands and traverse city streets without feeling like I’m walking on fire. For someone with sensitive feet, discovering a brand that offers standout styles with ample arch support can be a challenge. Fortunately, Tony Bianco’s shoes are not only comfortable but also ultra-chic. I purchased the trending Shae mule in butterscotch suede, and I’m not exaggerating when I say I can comfortably wear them daily. The material is buttery soft, and the spacious toe box means I don’t have to fret about pinching or rubbing.

If you’re in search of an elegant kitten heel or a sophisticated slingback that will turn heads, Tony Bianco boasts a wide array of unique options that perfectly balance comfort and style. Explore your new favorite footwear, whether you prefer a low heel, a flat, or something with more height; this trendsetting brand has something to suit everyone’s taste.

The Polished Low Heel

For an everyday option, consider a low- to mid-height heel for all-day comfort. Best paired with an ankle-grazing palazzo pant or flouncy midi skirt, these styles are bound to invite envious glances.

Tony Bianco Shae Mule

Tony Bianco Quill Slingback

Tony Bianco Daisy Sandal

Tony Bianco Caprice Heel

The Sleek High Heel

Whether you’re after a mesh heel for a date night in the city, or an elegant raffia sandal to complement vacation dresses, our top picks below have you covered.

Tony Bianco Corso Heel

The Glamorous Flat

These options prove that a flat can be just as sophisticated as a heel. Opt for a suede loafer to work, a chunky flip-flop for a trip to the beach, or a versatile ballet flat for any casual outing.
